properties.comment: Read help when first time used

properties.text: I didn't understand your additional command, so I'll start from the game menu.
Would you like to play guess or pick the number game.
What would you like to play this time, guess or pick the number.
What would you like to play now, guess or pick the number game.
Lets go again. Would you like to guess or to pick the number.
Please say, would you like to play: guess the number, or pick the number game.
Looks like we got stuck. I'll leave.
I didn't understand that. Please say, would you like to guess or to pick the number.
OK. You should pick one number between ${MIN} and ${MAX}, and remember it. <break time="1s"/> Are you ready?
Great. Please pick one number between ${MIN} and ${MAX}, and remember it. <break time="1s"/> Are you ready?
Have you picked the number? Are you ready for the game?

Alright. Take a moment and pick the number. <break time="2s"/>
Are you ready now?

No problem. Take a moment and choose one number. <break time="2s"/>
Can we start the game?

Alright. Just take your time and try to choose one number up to ${MAX}. <break time="2.5s"/>
Say yes if you are ready
I didn't understand that. Please say, have you picked the number? Are you ready?
Just say yes, if you are ready.

Please tell me is your number above or below ${guess}?
Is your number higher or lower than ${guess}?

Is your number less or greater than ${guess} or is the ${guess} correct answer?
So, is it greater or less than ${guess}.
I picked one number between ${MIN} and ${MAX}. What is your guess?
Please tell me your guess. A number between ${MIN} and ${MAX}.

Please tell me your guess. A number between ${MIN} and ${MAX}.
Bravo! <break time="500ms"/> ${result.guess} is the correct answer!<break time="500ms"/>
You got it on the first try!
<break time="500ms"/> Returning to the game menu.
You are currently trying to guess which number between ${MIN} and ${MAX} I picked. Try to say something like: Is Your number 42?

We finished the game. <break time="500ms"/> Would that be all?

Say yes if you want me to exit or say no to return to game menu.

properties.name: Pick game - Guess the number user picked

properties.comment: Set the picked number and initialize the minimum and maximum that user guessed to default values

properties.name: Guess game - Check if almost guessed

properties.text: By the way, number to guess will be ${picked_number}.<break time="1s"/>

<prosody rate="slow" volume="loud">Ask 
${NAME_AMAZON}, to guess my number
</prosody>
Clash mode is when I am playing against another smart speaker device which has this same game enabled too.
In order this mode to work, I have to know what is the other device name. In other words, how will I invoke it.
If it is near by while we are setting it's invocation, it might be a good idea to turn the microphone off on it.
We have two types of games. The first is I pick the number and you have to guess it, and the other is you pick the number and I guess.
You can change valid number range by saying: set limit to 100.
During the game you can give up if you get stuck or ask for help.
